channel.title: How do i remove the flame animations from my login screen?
channel.description:
Hey there, I'm just editing my login screen background, but I need to remove the flame animations from either sides of the login box, I have been going through the client folder for the past half hour trying to figure out how to remove them.
[img]http://www.pixeloaded.com/newrunescrap/gallery/data/media/19/rs9.JPG[/img]
Please could someone help me! much appreciated,
